column4: I picked up an Acer Aspire One D255E (10.1 netbook) just to play around with. Which would be the best option.. Ubuntu 10.10 or the 10.10 netbook edition?
are you familiar with both? either?
well, unity is going to be 'revolutionary', I guess. Not that that is always good =/
versus the gnome you know and love, more or less.
